pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of big data from aCGH experiments using parallel computing and ff objects // Analysis and plotting of array CGH data. Allows usage of Circular Binary Segementation, wavelet- based smoothing (both as in Liu et al., and HaarSeg as in Ben- Yaacov and Eldar), HMM, BioHMM, GLAD, CGHseg. Most computations are parallelized (either via forking or with clusters, including MPI and sockets clusters) and use ff for storing data.
